plot: A wheelchair-bound widow with a small son takes in three male boarders, each of whom becomes a father-figure to the boy.
plot_en: A wheelchair-bound widow with a small son takes in three male boarders, each of whom becomes a father-figure to the boy.
plot_es: A wheelchair-bound widow with a small son takes in three male boarders, each of whom becomes a father-figure to the boy.
title: The Godfathers
